(SourceFile 
  (PackageClause 
    (PackageIdentifier "main")) 
  (FunctionDeclaration 
    (Block 
      (Statement 
        (ConstDeclaration 
          (ConstSpec 
            (ExpressionList 
              (Expression 
                (CompositeLiteral 
                  (LiteralValue 
                    (Element 
                      (Expression 
                        (IntLiteral "1"))) 
                    (Element 
                      (Expression 
                        (IntLiteral "2"))) 
                    (Element 
                      (Expression 
                        (IntLiteral "3")))) 
                  (ImplicitLengthArrayType 
                    (Type 
                      (SimpleType 
                        (TypeIdentifier "int"))))))) 
            (Identifier "a1"))))) 
    (Identifier "main") 
    (ParameterList)))
